meanings.sent1: The pshaws look on his face showed he didn't believe her.
meanings.sent2: She gave a pshaws response to the ridiculous suggestion.
meanings.sent3: When he saw the messy room, he made a pshaws noise.
meanings.sent4: Her pshaws attitude towards the idea was clear.
meanings.sent5: The pshaws expression on his face said it all.

meanings.definition: To dismiss or reject something with a sound of contempt.
meanings.sent1: He would often pshaws at the idea of eating broccoli.
meanings.sent2: She pshawed at the thought of going to the boring meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cat pshaws at the toy mouse before walking away.
meanings.sent4: The audience pshaws the bad performance with loud boos.
meanings.sent5: The teacher pshaws the incorrect answer with a shake of the head.
